content: Dear users, with the arrival of the blockchain bull market, many currencies are experiencing astonishing gains. In order to enable TrueDEX users to enjoy the high returns brought by the bull market, TrueDEX will continue to introduce high growth value currencies. TrueDEX has now been listed in three trading currencies: KPEPE/USDT (KPEPE is 1000PEPE), DOT/USDT, and APT/USDT. Welcome everyone to truedex.io for trading!
